name: Real Fruit Ninja
description:
This game is a school project involving controls via an Arduino card.
The goal was to make a game involving pushing on real fruits to destroy the corresponding ones on the screen.

To use it with only a computer, we mapped the fruits as the following keys :

E = apple/pomme, R = banana/banane, T = carrot/carotte, U = pear/poire, I =  tomato/tomate, P = onion/oignon
